attributes.action: MPs must resign from Parliament, if they are guilty of breaking the law.
attributes.additional_details: Current Members of Parliament have broken the laws they have set. It is inappropriate that the rule makers, are themselves breaking these laws. Members of Parliament should lead by example, not have the belief that there is one rule for them and another for the rest of society.
attributes.background: Require Members of Parliament to step down from their position in Parliament, if they are found guilty of breaking the law. Members of Parliament create the laws of the land and therefore should uphold the laws too.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop people with a criminal conviction serving as an MP: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603692

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705
